verses.verse: And the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> and <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G4863>together<s%> <S%G4314>around<s%> Him when they had <S%G2064>come<s%> from <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%>

and had <S%G3708>seen<s%> that <S%G5100>some<s%> of His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were <S%G2068>eating<s%> their <S%G740>bread<s%> with <S%G2839>impure<s%> <S%G5495>hands,<s%> that is, <S%G449>unwashed.<s%>

(For the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> do not <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> they <S%G4435>carefully<s%> <S%G3538>wash<s%> their <S%G5495>hands,<s%> [thus] <S%G2902>observing<s%> the <S%G3862>traditions<s%> of the <S%G4245>elders;<s%>

and [when they come] from the <S%G58>market<s%> <S%G58>place,<s%> they do not <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> they <S%G4472>cleanse<s%> themselves; and there are <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G4183>things<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they have <S%G3880>received<s%> in order to <S%G2902>observe,<s%> such as the <S%G909>washing<s%> of <S%G4221>cups<s%> and <S%G3582>pitchers<s%> and <S%G5473>copper<s%> <S%G5473>pots.<s%>)

And the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> and the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> Him, <S%G1223>"Why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> do Your <S%G3101>disciples<s%> not <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G3862>tradition<s%> of the <S%G4245>elders,<s%> but <S%G2068>eat<s%> their <S%G740>bread<s%> with <S%G2839>impure<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%>?"

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, " <S%G2573>Rightly<s%> did <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> <S%G4395>prophesy<s%> of you <S%G5273>hypocrites,<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G3778>'This<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G5091>honors<s%> Me with their <S%G5491>lips,<s%> But their <S%G2588>heart<s%> is <S%G4206>far<s%> <S%G568>away<s%> <S%G4206><s%> from Me.
'But in <S%G3155>vain<s%> do they <S%G4576>worship<s%> Me, <S%G1321>Teaching<s%> as <S%G1319>doctrines<s%> the <S%G1778>precepts<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>'
<S%G863>"Neglecting<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> you <S%G2902>hold<s%> to the <S%G3862>tradition<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>"

He was <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, "You <S%G2573>nicely<s%> <S%G114>set<s%> <S%G114>aside<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> to <S%G5083>keep<s%> your <S%G3862>tradition.<s%>

"For <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5091>'Honor<s%> your <S%G3962>father<s%> and your <S%G3384>mother<s%>'; and, 'He who <S%G2551>speaks<s%> <S%G2551>evil<s%> of <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> let him be <S%G5053>put<s%> to <S%G2288>death<s%>';

but you <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1437>'If<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> to [his] <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> [his] <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G3739>anything<s%> <S%G1437><s%> of <S%G1473>mine<s%> you might have been <S%G5623>helped<s%> by is <S%G2878>Corban<s%> (that is to say, <S%G1435>given<s%> [to God]),'
you <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>longer<s%> <S%G863>permit<s%> him to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3762>anything<s%> for [his] <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> [his] <S%G3384>mother;<s%>

[thus] <S%G208>invalidating<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> by your <S%G3862>tradition<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G3860>handed<s%> <S%G3860>down;<s%> and you <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4183>things<s%> <S%G3946>such<s%> as that. "

And after He <S%G4341>called<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> to Him <S%G3825>again,<s%> He [began] <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, <S%G191>"Listen<s%> to Me, <S%G3956>all<s%> of you, and understand: <S%G4920><s%>

there is <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G1855>outside<s%> the <S%G444>man<s%> which <S%G1531>going<s%> into him <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G2840>defile<s%> him; but the things which <S%G1607>proceed<s%> out of the <S%G444>man<s%> are what <S%G2840>defile<s%> the <S%G444>man.<s%>
<S%G1487>["If<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3775>ears<s%> to <S%G191>hear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear.<s%>"]

And <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G575>leaving<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> He had <S%G1525>entered<s%> the <S%G3624>house,<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1905>questioned<s%> Him about the <S%G3850>parable.<s%>

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "Are you <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G801>lacking<s%> in <S%G801>understanding<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>? Do you not <S%G3539>understand<s%> that <S%G3956>whatever<s%> <S%G1531>goes<s%> into the <S%G444>man<s%> from <S%G1855>outside<s%> <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2840>defile<s%> him;

<S%G3754>because<s%> it does not <S%G1531>go<s%> into his <S%G2588>heart,<s%> but into his <S%G2836>stomach,<s%> and is <S%G1519>eliminated<s%> <S%G856><s%> <S%G1607><s%>?" ([Thus He] <S%G2511>declared<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1033>foods<s%> <S%G2511>clean.<s%>)
And He was <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "That which <S%G1607>proceeds<s%> out of the <S%G444>man,<s%> that is what <S%G2840>defiles<s%> the <S%G444>man.<s%>

"For from <S%G2081>within,<s%> out of the <S%G2588>heart<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G1607>proceed<s%> the <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G1261>thoughts,<s%> <S%G4202>fornications,<s%> <S%G2829>thefts,<s%> <S%G5408>murders,<s%> <S%G3430>adulteries,<s%>

<S%G4124>deeds<s%> of <S%G4124>coveting<s%> [and] <S%G4189>wickedness,<s%> [as well as] <S%G1388>deceit,<s%> <S%G766>sensuality,<s%> <S%G3788>envy,<s%> <S%G4190><s%> <S%G988>slander,<s%> <S%G5243>pride<s%> [and] <S%G877>foolishness.<s%>
<S%G3956>"All<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G4190>things<s%> <S%G1607>proceed<s%> from <S%G2081>within<s%> and <S%G2840>defile<s%> the <S%G444>man.<s%>"

And from <S%G1564>there<s%> He <S%G450>arose<s%> and <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> to the <S%G3725>region<s%> of <S%G5184>Tyre.<s%> And when He had <S%G1525>entered<s%> a <S%G3614>house,<s%> He <S%G2309>wanted<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> to <S%G1097>know<s%> [of it;] <S%G2532>yet<s%> He <S%G1410>could<s%> not <S%G2990>escape<s%> <S%G2990>notice.<s%>

But after <S%G191>hearing<s%> of Him, a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G2365>little<s%> <S%G2365>daughter<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> an <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> <S%G2117>immediately<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G4363>fell<s%> at His <S%G4228>feet.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> was a <S%G1674>Gentile,<s%> of the <S%G4949>Syrophoenician<s%> <S%G1085>race.<s%> And she kept <S%G2065>asking<s%> Him to <S%G1544>cast<s%> the <S%G1140>demon<s%> out of her <S%G2364>daughter.<s%>

And He was <S%G3004>saying<s%> to her, <S%G863>"Let<s%> the <S%G5043>children<s%> be <S%G5526>satisfied<s%> <S%G4413>first,<s%> for it is not <S%G2570>good<s%> to <S%G2983>take<s%> the children's <S%G740>bread<s%> and <S%G906>throw<s%> it to the <S%G2952>dogs.<s%>"

But she <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G3483>"Yes,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> [but] <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G2952>dogs<s%> <S%G5270>under<s%> the <S%G5132>table<s%> <S%G2068>feed<s%> on the children's <S%G5589>crumbs.<s%>"

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to her, <S%G1223>"Because<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3056>answer<s%> <S%G5217>go<s%> your <S%G5217>way;<s%> the <S%G1140>demon<s%> has <S%G1831>gone<s%> out of your <S%G2364>daughter.<s%>"

And <S%G565>going<s%> <S%G565>back<s%> to her <S%G3624>home,<s%> she <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G3813>child<s%> <S%G906>lying<s%> on the <S%G2825>bed,<s%> the <S%G1140>demon<s%> having <S%G1831>departed.<s%>

And <S%G3825>again<s%> He <S%G1831>went<s%> out from the <S%G3725>region<s%> of <S%G5184>Tyre,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4605>Sidon<s%> to the <S%G2281>Sea<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G303>within<s%> <S%G3319><s%> the <S%G3725>region<s%> of <S%G1179>Decapolis.<s%>

And they <S%G5342>brought<s%> to Him <S%G2974>one<s%> <S%G2974>who<s%> was <S%G2974>deaf<s%> and <S%G3424>spoke<s%> with <S%G3424>difficulty,<s%> and they <S%G3870>entreated<s%> Him to <S%G2007>lay<s%> His <S%G5495>hand<s%> upon him.

And He <S%G618>took<s%> him <S%G618>aside<s%> from the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> by <S%G2398>himself,<s%> and <S%G906>put<s%> His <S%G1147>fingers<s%> into his <S%G3775>ears,<s%> and after <S%G4429>spitting,<s%> He <S%G681>touched<s%> his <S%G1100>tongue<s%> [with the saliva;]
and <S%G308>looking<s%> up to <S%G3772>heaven<s%> with a <S%G4727>deep<s%> <S%G4727>sigh,<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2188>"Ephphatha!<s%>" that is, "Be <S%G1272>opened!<s%>"
And his <S%G189>ears<s%> were <S%G455>opened,<s%> and the <S%G1199>impediment<s%> of his <S%G1100>tongue<s%> was <S%G3089>removed,<s%> and he [began] <S%G2980>speaking<s%> <S%G3723>plainly.<s%>

And He <S%G1291>gave<s%> them <S%G1291>orders<s%> not to <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G3367>anyone;<s%> but the <S%G3745>more<s%> He <S%G1291>ordered<s%> them, the <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G4053>widely<s%> they continued to <S%G2784>proclaim<s%> it.

And they were <S%G5249>utterly<s%> <S%G1605>astonished,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "He has <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G2573>well;<s%> He <S%G4160>makes<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G2974>deaf<s%> to <S%G191>hear,<s%> and the <S%G216>dumb<s%> to <S%G2980>speak.<s%>"
